Kattiana Fernandes Constantino

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/3081878651653793
  • Última atualização do currículo em 26/03/2018

I am Kattiana Constantino, Brazilian, living in Belo Horizonte/Minas Gerais/ Brazil. I obtained my bachelor degree in Computer Sciences at University of São Paulo (USP) with grant from the National Council for Scientific and Technological Development (CNPq) and the São Paulo Research Foundation (FAPESP). Furthermore, I have two specialization being one of them on Object Orientation at University of Campinas (UNICAMP) and another on Project Management of Information Technology at University of São Paulo (USP). Finally, I completed my master degree in Software Engineering and Data Visualization from Federal University of Minas Gerais (UFMG). Currently, I am doctoral student in Computer Science, focusing on Software Engineering and Data Visualization. (Texto informado pelo autor)
